recipe.title: Thai Iced Tea Caffeinated Smoothie Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 1 ½ cups ; thai tea, brewed, cooled ; (360 mL)
¼ cup ; sweetened condensed milk ; (75 g)

steps.step: Pour the Thai tea into an ice cube tray. Freeze for at least 4 hours, or overnight.
Add the Thai tea ice cubes, milk, and sweetened condensed milk to a blender and blend until smooth.
Pour into glasses and top with whipped cream. Garnish with star anise.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Pour the Thai tea into an ice cube tray.
Freeze for at least 4 hours, or overnight.
Add the Thai tea ice cubes, milk, and sweetened condensed milk to a blender and blend until smooth.
Pour into glasses and top with whipped cream.
